This role isfor apps and users who run queries.Adoption of role-based access control might increase the latency of somerequests. Each unique combination of service resource (index, indexer, etc.) andservice principal used on a request triggers an authorization check.
Theseauthorization checks can add up to 200 milliseconds of latency to a request.In rare cases where requests originate from a high number of different serviceprincipals, all targeting different service resources (indexes, indexers, etc.), it'spossible for the authorization checks to result in throttling.
